original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ah! The teacher of teachers, the All-Creating King,

original: bsgom pas nges par 'byin par bshad pa ni //
analyzed: bsgom pas nges par 'byin par bshad pa ni //
translated: has explained that definite liberation comes through meditation.

original: rang bzhin bcu ru dgongs pas bshad pa yang //
analyzed: rang bzhin bcu ru dgongs pas bshad pa yang //
translated: The explanations of the ten natures are also included

original: skye ba med pa'i don du bsdus te bstan //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i don du bsdus te bstan //
translated: in the teaching that subsumes them within the meaning of nonorigination.

original: skye med rtogs pa'i don las ma yengs pas //
analyzed: skye med rtogs pa'i don las ma yengs pas //
translated: Since there is no distraction from the meaning of the realization of nonorigination,

original: bsgoms pa'i mdo lung bcu ru bsdus te bstan //
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i mdo lung bcu ru bsdus te bstan //
translated: the sutra of meditation is explained as subsumed in ten transmissions.

original: 'di las 'phros shing thams cad 'dir 'dus pas //
analyzed: 'di las 'phros shing thams cad 'dir 'dus pas //
translated: Since everything is included here,

original: kun gyi rtsa ba don gyi 'grel ba'i lung //
analyzed: kun gyi rtsa ba don gyi 'grel ba'i lung //
translated: the source of all is the explanatory transmission of the ultimate meaning.

original: kun byed nga yi sras su gyur ba la //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi sras su gyur ba la //
translated: To those who become my heirs,

original: ming gis don mtshon skye med rtogs phyir bstan //
analyzed: ming gis don mtshon skye med rtogs phyir bstan //
translated: the all-creating one, the meaning is revealed through names in order to realize nonorigination.üîΩAh!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis //
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis //
translated: Bodhisattva Vajra, be diligent!

original: theg pa'i rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi lung //
analyzed: theg pa'i rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi lung //
translated: The transmission of awakened mind, the root of all spiritual approaches,

original: kun byed rgyal pos bsdus pa'i rtsa ba 'di //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal pos bsdus pa'i rtsa ba 'di //
translated: is subsumed in this king of all-creating ones, the root.

original: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par rtogs 'gyur na //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje legs par rtogs 'gyur na //
translated: If bodhisattva Vajra realizes this well,

original: rgyal ba'i rgyal ba kun byed rgyal por 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i rgyal ba kun byed rgyal por 'gyur //
translated: he will become the king of all victorious ones, the all-creating monarch.

original: de phyir kun byed nga yi 'khor rnams la //
analyzed: de phyir kun byed nga yi 'khor rnams la //
translated: Therefore, my retinue, all-creating ones,

original: sems dpa' rdo rjes don 'di lung ston cig /
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rjes don 'di lung ston cig /
translated: Vajra of Mind, reveal the meaning of this!

original: skye med byang chub sems su lung ston cig /
analyzed: skye med byang chub sems su lung ston cig /
translated: Reveal it to be unborn awakened mind!

original: 'khor 'das dbyings su gcig par lung ston cig /
analyzed: 'khor 'das dbyings su gcig par lung ston cig /
translated: Reveal it to be the single basic space of samsara and nirvana!

original: rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs bar lung ston cig /
analyzed: rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs bar lung ston cig /
translated: Reveal it to be the perfection of cause and effect simultaneously!

original: ces gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: dgongs don lde mig gi le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: dgongs don lde mig gi le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
translated: This is the eighty-first chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, the mind of perfect enlightenment, the tantra that is the mind of perfect enlightenment.üîΩThe Key to the Key Points

original: de nas byang chub @119b kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes gus pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub @119b kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes gus pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa /
translated: Then, the bodhisattva Vajra of Mind respectfully praised the all-creating monarch with these words:

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
translated: Kye! You, the all-creating monarch, teacher of teachers,

original: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings //
translated: Are the nature of victorious ones of the three times, the basic space of phenomena.

original: 'khor ba mi spong thugs rje phyogs ris med //üîΩston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: 'khor ba mi spong thugs rje phyogs ris med // ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
translated: You do not reject samsara, and your compassion is impartial.üîΩI bow to you, the all-creating monarch, teacher.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
translated: Kye! You, the all-creating monarch, teacher of teachers,

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun byed khyod kyi byas //
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun byed khyod kyi byas //
translated: You, all-accomplishing one, are the creator of all buddhas of the past.

original: ma byon pa dang da ltar byed cing mdzad //üîΩston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: ma byon pa dang da ltar byed cing mdzad // ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
translated: You are the creator of all buddhas of the future and the present.üîΩI bow to you, the all-creating, teaching king.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
translated: O teacher of teachers, all-creating monarch,

original: khams gsum srid gsum byed mkhan khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: khams gsum srid gsum byed mkhan khyod kyis byas //
translated: you are the creator of the three realms and three existences.

original: rang 'byung lnga dang rgyan gyi rgyu lnga dang // ye shes lnga byas kun byed khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: rang 'byung lnga dang rgyan gyi rgyu lnga dang // ye shes lnga byas kun byed khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, all-creating one, who creates the five naturally occurring gems, the five adornments, and the five kinds of pristine wisdom.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
translated: O teacher of teachers, all-creating monarch,

original: sku gsum ston pa gsum yang khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pa gsum yang khyod kyis byas //
translated: you are the creator of the three teachers of the three kayas.

original: sku gsum thugs gsum ma lus kun byas pas //üîΩston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: sku gsum thugs gsum ma lus kun byas pas // ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
translated: Since you create all three kayas and three pristine wisdoms without exception,üîΩI bow to you, all-creating, teaching monarch.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
translated: O teacher of teachers, all-creating monarch,

original: sku gsum bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: sku gsum bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang khyod kyis byas //
translated: you are the creator of the three kayas‚Äô abode.

original: 'khor gyi dang po sdud pa'ang nyid las byung //
analyzed: 'khor gyi dang po sdud pa'ang nyid las byung //
translated: The first retinue that gathers is also created from you.

original: ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, all-creating, teaching monarch.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
translated: Ah! You, the teacher of teachers, all-creating sovereign,

original: 'dus pa'i 'khor yang nges par khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i 'khor yang nges par khyod kyis byas //
translated: You have also defined the assembly of disciples.

original: bstan pa gsum yang nges par khyod kyis byas //
analyzed: bstan pa gsum yang nges par khyod kyis byas //
translated: You have also defined the three teachings.

original: kun byed rgyal po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I pay homage to and am in awe of the very one, the all-creating monarch.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
translated: Ah! You, the teacher of teachers, all-creating monarch,

original: zag med shes rab rtogs pa gsum @120a *//
analyzed: zag med shes rab rtogs pa gsum @120a *//
translated: By teaching the three realizations of uncontaminated praj√±ƒÅ

original: bstan pas // 'khor gyi mun pa'i dkyil 'khor snang mdzad pa //
analyzed: bstan pas // 'khor gyi mun pa'i dkyil 'khor snang mdzad pa //
translated: You illuminate the ma·πá·∏çala of darkness in the retinue.

original: kun byed rgyal po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I pay homage to and am in awe of the very one, the all-creating monarch.üîΩAh! You, the teacher of teachers, all-creating monarch,

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod; ;nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod; ;nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las //
translated: From your single mind of self-originated wisdom

original: 'byung zhing sdud pa'i rtsa ba khyod nyid pas //
analyzed: 'byung zhing sdud pa'i rtsa ba khyod nyid pas //
translated: You are the root of all that arises and is subsumed.

original: chos kyi snying po khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: chos kyi snying po khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I pay homage to and am in awe of you, the essence of dharma.

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
translated: Ah! You, the teacher of teachers, all-creating monarch,

original: ma rig pa yi lam ni bsal nas kyang //
analyzed: ma rig pa yi lam ni bsal nas kyang //
translated: Having cleared the path of ignorance,

original: ye shes snang ba kun tu mched par byed //
analyzed: ye shes snang ba kun tu mched par byed //
translated: It causes the light of timeless awareness to shine everywhere.

original: ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, teacher, all-creating sovereign.

original: kye / ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni thams cad kun //
analyzed: kye / ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni thams cad kun //
translated: O! All phenomena, however they appear,

original: rang 'byung nyid pas rgyu rkyen kun dang bral //
analyzed: rang 'byung nyid pas rgyu rkyen kun dang bral //
translated: are naturally occurring, so they are free of any causes or conditions.

original: ma bcos snying po ji bzhin gsal bas na //
analyzed: ma bcos snying po ji bzhin gsal bas na //
translated: The uncontrived heart essence is evident just as it is,

original: rang 'byung ye shes kun byed rgyal po nyid //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes kun byed rgyal po nyid //
translated: so naturally occurring timeless awareness is the all-creating monarch.

original: ji ltar brtags kyang gting mtha' dbus med de //
analyzed: ji ltar brtags kyang gting mtha' dbus med de //
translated: No matter how it is examined, it has no depth, no limits, no center.

original: kun gyi 'byung gnas bsam pa'i yul las 'das //
analyzed: kun gyi 'byung gnas bsam pa'i yul las 'das //
translated: It is the source of everything, yet transcends the realm of thought.

original: skye 'gag dmigs 'jug las 'das rnam par zhi //
analyzed: skye 'gag dmigs 'jug las 'das rnam par zhi //
translated: It is utterly peaceful, beyond origination, cessation, objectification, or involvement.

original: su zhig 'jug cing dmigs dang dad pa dag /
analyzed: su zhig 'jug cing dmigs dang dad pa dag /
translated: Who could engage in it, objectify it, or have faith in it?

original: 'di la dman dang dam par dmigs med pas //
analyzed: 'di la dman dang dam par dmigs med pas //
translated: Since there is no objectification of it as being either inferior or sublime,

original: mi rtsol bde la gnas shing dbugs phyin 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtsol bde la gnas shing dbugs phyin 'gyur //
translated: one rests in effortless bliss and experiences relief.

original: chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po las //üîΩji ltar gnas pa rtsol sgrub kun dang bral /
analyzed: chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po las // ji ltar gnas pa rtsol sgrub kun dang bral /
translated: From The All-Creating Monarch, the root of all Dharma,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is shown that things abide just as they are, free of all effort and achievement.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: From The All-Creating Monarch, the mind of enlightenment,

original: rjes su bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: rjes su bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the eighty-second chapter, on praise, of this Ornament of theüîΩMahayana Sutras.üîΩChapter 83: The Tantra of the Mind of Perfect PurityüîΩThen Bodhisattva Good Warrior asked the all-creating king,

original: @120b de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rje legs par 'dun nas zhus pa /
analyzed: @120b de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rje legs par 'dun nas zhus pa /
translated: awakened mind:üîΩ‚ÄúKye!

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: All-creating king, teacher of teachers,

original: ji ltar snang zhing grags pa'i chos rnams kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang zhing grags pa'i chos rnams kun //
translated: all phenomena, however they appear and are renowned,

original: rang 'byung ye shes gcig tu bstan pa'i mdo //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes gcig tu bstan pa'i mdo //
translated: are taught to be a single, naturally occurring timeless awareness.

original: chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud //
analyzed: chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud //
translated: The tantra of the all-creating monarch is the source of phenomena.

original: phyi rabs rnal 'byor gang dang gang dag las //
analyzed: phyi rabs rnal 'byor gang dang gang dag las //
translated: For any and all yogic practitioners of future generations,

original: bstan cing gdams pa legs par bshad du gsol //üîΩzhes zhus so //
analyzed: bstan cing gdams pa legs par bshad du gsol // zhes zhus so //
translated: please teach and explain well the instructions.‚Äù

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos skal ldan la gdams pa'i don 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos skal ldan la gdams pa'i don 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, spoke these words of instruction for fortunate ones:üîΩ‚ÄúKye!

original: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da nyon cig /
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da nyon cig /
translated: Good Warrior, listen well!

original: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
analyzed: ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas //
translated: I, the all-creating monarch, teacher of teachers,

original: ji ltar snang zhing grags pa'i chos rnams kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang zhing grags pa'i chos rnams kun //
translated: all phenomena, however they appear and are renowned,

original: ngas byas byed dang byed 'gyur snying po'i don //
analyzed: ngas byas byed dang byed 'gyur snying po'i don //
translated: I have done, am doing, and will do

original: gzhi rtsa kun 'das snying po byang chub rgyu //
analyzed: gzhi rtsa kun 'das snying po byang chub rgyu //
translated: The ultimate meaning of the essence.

original: dgongs pa mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung 'di //
analyzed: dgongs pa mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung 'di //
translated: This s≈´tra that reveals the transcendent stateüîΩHas great faith, commitment, and perseverance,

original: dad dang dam tshig brtson 'grus che ba dang // snying rje yi rang skyo dad yid ldog med //
analyzed: dad dang dam tshig brtson 'grus che ba dang // snying rje yi rang skyo dad yid ldog med //
translated: Compassion, joy, and an unwavering mind.

original: lus dang bu dang chung ma bran dang nor //
analyzed: lus dang bu dang chung ma bran dang nor //
translated: Without attachment to body, children, wife, servants, or wealth,

original: gang la'ang ma chags dad dang dga' bas 'bul //
analyzed: gang la'ang ma chags dad dang dga' bas 'bul //
translated: Offer with faith and delight.

original: 'di dag dad dang dam tshig rtags yin pas //
analyzed: 'di dag dad dang dam tshig rtags yin pas //
translated: These are the signs of faith and commitment.

original: snying po'i don dang ldan pas sbyin par bya //
analyzed: snying po'i don dang ldan pas sbyin par bya //
translated: Give to those who possess the meaning of the essence.üîΩAbandoning fame, free from hypocrisy,

original: grags pa spang zhing ba rgyal bral ba dang // dam pa snying po'i don phyir lus srog phangs pa med //
analyzed: grags pa spang zhing ba rgyal bral ba dang // dam pa snying po'i don phyir lus srog phangs pa med //
translated: For the sake of the ultimate meaning of the sublime essence, not cherishing body or life,

original: bka' las mi 'da' rtags dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: bka' las mi 'da' rtags dang ldan pa la //
translated: Not transgressing the command, possessing the signs,

original: snying po don dang skye med bstan pa sbyin //
analyzed: snying po don dang skye med bstan pa sbyin //
translated: The teaching of the unborn ultimate meaning is given.

original: gang gis @121a *//
analyzed: gang gis @121a *//
translated: Whoever

original: snying po'i bstan pa bdag thob na //
analyzed: snying po'i bstan pa bdag thob na //
translated: Obtains this teaching of the essence,

original: 'jig rten mtshan mas bdag la ci bgyi ste //
analyzed: 'jig rten mtshan mas bdag la ci bgyi ste //
translated: What can worldly signs do to me?

original: thob na bdag gis dka' ba sgrub bo zhes //
analyzed: thob na bdag gis dka' ba sgrub bo zhes //
translated: If you are pleased, I will do whatever is difficult.‚Äù

original: dam bca' legs par gnas na bstan pa sbyin //
analyzed: dam bca' legs par gnas na bstan pa sbyin //
translated: If you are able to keep your promise well, I will give you the teachings.

original: ji srid bdag dang slob dpon 'tsho ba'i bar //
analyzed: ji srid bdag dang slob dpon 'tsho ba'i bar //
translated: ‚ÄúFor as long as I and the master are alive,

original: lus dang srog gi 'brel ba ma mchis par //
analyzed: lus dang srog gi 'brel ba ma mchis par //
translated: Without any regard for my body or life,

original: khyod kyi bka' bzhin sgrub ces gnas bor la //
analyzed: khyod kyi bka' bzhin sgrub ces gnas bor la //
translated: I will give up my home and practice according to your words.

original: bstan pa'i snying po kun byed rgyal po sbyin //
analyzed: bstan pa'i snying po kun byed rgyal po sbyin //
translated: I will give you the essence of the teachings, the All-Creating Monarch.‚Äù

original: mdor na lus dang srog kyang 'bul bya zhing //
analyzed: mdor na lus dang srog kyang 'bul bya zhing //
translated: In brief, I will offer even my body and life,

original: rdzas dang zhing yul rkang 'gros smos ci dgos //
analyzed: rdzas dang zhing yul rkang 'gros smos ci dgos //
translated: To say nothing of my wealth, fields, and livestock.üîΩEven if you do not consider me,

original: gal te bdag la dgongs par ma gyur kyang; ;dam pas blangs te dkon mchog gsum la 'bul //
analyzed: gal te bdag la dgongs par ma gyur kyang; ;dam pas blangs te dkon mchog gsum la 'bul //
translated: I will take them and offer them to the Three Jewels.‚Äù

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ky√©! The teacher of teachers, the all-creating monarch,

original: snod min log pa'i gang zag bstan pa ni //
analyzed: snod min log pa'i gang zag bstan pa ni //
translated: Has taught about the unsuitable, mistaken individuals:üîΩThose who delight in fame and worldly affairs,

original: grags dang 'jig rten chos la dga' ba dang // nga rgyal dam par mi bkur yid thung ldog /
analyzed: grags dang 'jig rten chos la dga' ba dang // nga rgyal dam par mi bkur yid thung ldog /
translated: Who are arrogant and disrespectful, and who are short-tempered and turn away;

original: 'phyar zhing rdzas dang dad par mi ldan te //
analyzed: 'phyar zhing rdzas dang dad par mi ldan te //
translated: Who are haughty and do not have faith in or devotion to substances;

original: rang tshod nyams len btsan thabs 'dod pa dang // bstan pa yongs la 'phel zhing mi mthun zhing //
analyzed: rang tshod nyams len btsan thabs 'dod pa dang // bstan pa yongs la 'phel zhing mi mthun zhing //
translated: Or to increase the teachings while disagreeing with everyone.

original: sgro skur bdag gzhan gnod sems bsgom pa min //
analyzed: sgro skur bdag gzhan gnod sems bsgom pa min //
translated: It is not the cultivation of malice toward oneself or others,üîΩOr the exaggeration or denigration of the teachings.üîΩDo not teach this to those who are not suitable vessels,

original: 'di la mi bstan mchog tu gsang bar bya //
analyzed: 'di la mi bstan mchog tu gsang bar bya //
translated: But keep it most secret.

original: sngon du rtags dang dad pa brtag bya'i phyir //
analyzed: sngon du rtags dang dad pa brtag bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to examine the signs and faith of those who are suitable vessels,

original: rin chen dbyig dang chas pas gus mnod gyis //üîΩchags sems nga rgyal gzhan sems ma nges la //
analyzed: rin chen dbyig dang chas pas gus mnod gyis // chags sems nga rgyal gzhan sems ma nges la //
translated: They should be made to offer precious jewels and wealth with respect.üîΩDo not teach this to those with attachment, pride, or an uncertain attitude

original: de la kun byed rgyal po bstan mi bya //
analyzed: de la kun byed rgyal po bstan mi bya //
translated: Toward the all-creating monarch.

original: snying po'i @121b don la blang dor mi gnas kyang //
analyzed: snying po'i @121b don la blang dor mi gnas kyang //
translated: Although there is no acceptance or rejection in the meaning of the essence,

original: mi ma yin dang 'byung pos bar gcod cing //
analyzed: mi ma yin dang 'byung pos bar gcod cing //
translated: Nonhuman beings and spirits create obstacles.

original: mkha' 'gro grub pa can gyis gnyi ka la //üîΩdus min 'chi dang 'jigs pa'i dbang gyur nas //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro grub pa can gyis gnyi ka la // dus min 'chi dang 'jigs pa'i dbang gyur nas //
translated: Both the dakinis and the siddhasüîΩAre subject to untimely death and fear.

original: sgre skur dbang gis snying po'i theg pa nub //
analyzed: sgre skur dbang gis snying po'i theg pa nub //
translated: The essence vehicle will disappear due to exaggeration and denigration.

original: de bas rigs ngan gang zag spang bar bya //
analyzed: de bas rigs ngan gang zag spang bar bya //
translated: Therefore, reject those of the lowest class.

original: 'jig rten zhen pa dbral zhing rgyud brtag phyir //
analyzed: 'jig rten zhen pa dbral zhing rgyud brtag phyir //
translated: In order to separate the world from attachment and examine their mindstreams,

original: lus dang longs spyod bla mas kun blangs la //
analyzed: lus dang longs spyod bla mas kun blangs la //
translated: The guru takes everything, body and wealth,

original: nus dang mi nus khyad par rtags ldan nas //
analyzed: nus dang mi nus khyad par rtags ldan nas //
translated: and, having distinguished between what is possible and what is not,

original: snying po don bstan kun byed rgyal po sbyin //üîΩzhes gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: snying po don bstan kun byed rgyal po sbyin // zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: reveals the ultimate heart essence, the All-Creating Monarch.

original: bstan pa gang la gzhag pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: bstan pa gang la gzhag pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
translated: This is the eighty-third chapter of The All-Creating Monarch, in which the teacher reveals the title of the tantra.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par mdangs phyung ste 'dun nas zhus pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par mdangs phyung ste 'dun nas zhus pa /
translated: Then, the spiritual warrior-being Vajra, with a clear and focused mind, made a request:

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: ‚ÄúKye! All-Creating Monarch, teacher of teachers,

original: nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las //
analyzed: nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las //
translated: from your single mind‚Äîself-arisen wisdom‚Äî

original: skal ldan dus gcig grol bar mdzad pa'i mdo //
analyzed: skal ldan dus gcig grol bar mdzad pa'i mdo //
translated: a sutra is taught that liberates the fortunate all at once.

original: mtshan gyi khyad par bdag la bshad du gsol; zhes zhus so //
analyzed: mtshan gyi khyad par bdag la bshad du gsol; zhes zhus so //
translated: Please explain to me the specific title of this sutra.‚Äù

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos mtshan gyi rnam grangs rnam par phye ba 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos mtshan gyi rnam grangs rnam par phye ba 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, spoke these words, distinguishing the various titles of this tantra:

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis //
translated: Ah! The teacher of all teachers, the All-Creating King,

original: mtshan gyi khyad par phye ste bshad pa ni //
analyzed: mtshan gyi khyad par phye ste bshad pa ni //
translated: has explained the distinctions of the name.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
translated: All phenomena, however they appear,

original: ma lus kun byas byed cing byed 'gyur te //
analyzed: ma lus kun byas byed cing byed 'gyur te //
translated: are all created, are created by me, and will be created.

original: nyid la bya mi dgos te lhun grub pas //
analyzed: nyid la bya mi dgos te lhun grub pas //
translated: Since there is no need for me to create myself, I am spontaneously present,

original: @122a *// kun byed rgyal po zhes su bstan pa yin //
analyzed: @122a *// kun byed rgyal po zhes su bstan pa yin //
translated: and so I am revealed to be the All-Creating King.üîΩAh! Since my heart essence is immaculate

original: kye / snying po nga la dri ma med pa dang // ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i don ldan pas //
analyzed: kye / snying po nga la dri ma med pa dang // ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i don ldan pas //
translated: and meaningful in being unsought and spontaneously present,

original: 'di la btsal zhing sgrub pa mi mnga' ste //
analyzed: 'di la btsal zhing sgrub pa mi mnga' ste //
translated: there is no need to seek or achieve anything.

original: byang chub sems zhes nges par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: byang chub sems zhes nges par bstan pa yin //
translated: This is revealed to be awakened mind.

original: skye med gdod nas grub pa'i chos nyid la //
analyzed: skye med gdod nas grub pa'i chos nyid la //
translated: In the unborn nature of phenomena, primordially ensured,

original: rgyu dang rkyen med btsal med snying po 'di //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen med btsal med snying po 'di //
translated: this heart essence, which need not be sought and is not subject to causes or conditions,

original: ma bsgribs kun la phyogs ris med gsal bas //
analyzed: ma bsgribs kun la phyogs ris med gsal bas //
translated: is unobscured, clear, and impartial toward everything.

original: rang 'byung ye shes zhes su bstan pa yin //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes zhes su bstan pa yin //
translated: This is revealed to be naturally occurring timeless awareness.

original: kye / ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
analyzed: kye / ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
translated: Ah! All phenomena, however they appear,

original: ma bcos ji bzhin ngang la kun snang bas //
analyzed: ma bcos ji bzhin ngang la kun snang bas //
translated: Since everything appears in the unfabricated, just-as-it-is state,

original: phyogs ris gnyis su chad pa'i don med de //
analyzed: phyogs ris gnyis su chad pa'i don med de //
translated: there is no meaning in the biased division into two.

original: bka' yi 'brel ba chos kyi me long yin //
analyzed: bka' yi 'brel ba chos kyi me long yin //
translated: The connection of the Buddha‚Äôs words is the mirror of the dharma.

original: kye / ji bzhin ma bcos snying po rnal ma la //
analyzed: kye / ji bzhin ma bcos snying po rnal ma la //
translated: O! In the uncontrived, just-as-it-is, genuine heart essence,

original: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa 'byung sdud pa //
analyzed: 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa 'byung sdud pa //
translated: samsara and nirvana come together and are resolved.

original: blang dor 'dzin chags rgya las rnam grol te //
analyzed: blang dor 'dzin chags rgya las rnam grol te //
translated: Liberated from the fetters of attachment to acceptance and rejection,

original: snying po don gyi theg pa bstan pa yin //
analyzed: snying po don gyi theg pa bstan pa yin //
translated: I reveal the heart essence, the meaning of the spiritual approaches.

original: kye / 'das dang ma byon da ltar rgyal ba la //
analyzed: kye / 'das dang ma byon da ltar rgyal ba la //
translated: O! The victorious ones of the past, the present, and the future

original: skye med 'di las ma gzigs mi dgos pas //
analyzed: skye med 'di las ma gzigs mi dgos pas //
translated: need not see anything other than this unborn state.

original: ma bcos thig le gzung 'dzin las 'das pas //
analyzed: ma bcos thig le gzung 'dzin las 'das pas //
translated: The uncontrived bindu is beyond dualistic perception,

original: lta ba'i me long zhes su bstan pa yin //
analyzed: lta ba'i me long zhes su bstan pa yin //
translated: so it is revealed as the mirror of the view.

original: kye / nga ni ma bcos ji bzhin snying po la //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ma bcos ji bzhin snying po la //
translated: O! In me, the uncontrived, just-as-it-is heart essence,

original: sgro 'dogs skur 'debs don las kun 'das te //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs skur 'debs don las kun 'das te //
translated: all exaggeration and denigration are transcended.

original: dus gsum rgyal ba nga las byung bas na //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba nga las byung bas na //
translated: Since the victorious ones of the three times arise from me,

original: rgyal ba'i yum zhes nges par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i yum zhes nges par bstan pa yin //
translated: I am revealed to be the mother of the victorious ones.

original: kye / ma bcos skye med kun byed rgyal po la //
analyzed: kye / ma bcos skye med kun byed rgyal po la //
translated: O! In the uncontrived, unborn all-creating monarch,

original: @122b ma btsal dgos pa'i yon tan tshad rdzogs pas //
analyzed: @122b ma btsal dgos pa'i yon tan tshad rdzogs pas //
translated: Since the qualities that need not be sought are perfect in quantity,

original: btsal zhing bsgrub pa kun las 'das pas na //
analyzed: btsal zhing bsgrub pa kun las 'das pas na //
translated: and since they are beyond all that is sought and accomplished,

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes su bstan pa yin //
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes su bstan pa yin //
translated: this is explained to be the king of tantras.üîΩKy√©! Since the mind is placed without wavering on the unfabricated meaning,

original: kye / ma bcos don la mnor blo 'jog pas; ;snying po don la sgro dang skur pa bral //
analyzed: kye / ma bcos don la mnor blo 'jog pas; ;snying po don la sgro dang skur pa bral //
translated: in the meaning of the essence, there is freedom from exaggeration and denigration.

original: gnyi ga mi 'gal don du gang ston pa //
analyzed: gnyi ga mi 'gal don du gang ston pa //
translated: The meaning that is shown to be neither of those

original: ma bcos don gyi lung du bstan pa yin //
analyzed: ma bcos don gyi lung du bstan pa yin //
translated: is explained to be the transmission of the unfabricated meaning.üîΩKy√©! The transmission of the teacher, the teacher, the all-creating king,

original: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal pos lung bstan pa; ;skye med byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i don //
analyzed: kye / ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal pos lung bstan pa; ;skye med byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i don //
translated: is the meaning endowed with nonarising bodhicitta.

original: gnyis med snying por ro gcig gnas pa la //
analyzed: gnyis med snying por ro gcig gnas pa la //
translated: Abiding in the single taste of the nondual essence

original: kun gyi mdo ni mdo ru bstan pa yin //
analyzed: kun gyi mdo ni mdo ru bstan pa yin //
translated: is explained to be the s≈´tra of all s≈´tras.

original: kye / ma rig pa yi mun pa sel ba yin //
analyzed: kye / ma rig pa yi mun pa sel ba yin //
translated: Ky√©! This is the one that clears away the darkness of ignorance.

original: ye shes snang ba mched par byed pa yin //
analyzed: ye shes snang ba mched par byed pa yin //
translated: This is the one that increases the light of wisdom.

original: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gcod par byed pa yin //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gcod par byed pa yin //
translated: This is the one that cuts through the ocean of suffering.

original: snying po don la goms par byed pa yin //
analyzed: snying po don la goms par byed pa yin //
translated: This is the one that causes familiarity with the meaning of the essence.

original: kye / ngas ni ma rig pa yi dmigs bsal nas //
analyzed: kye / ngas ni ma rig pa yi dmigs bsal nas //
translated: Ky√©! Having distinguished ignorance,

original: skye med byang chub sems ni mngon bstan na //
analyzed: skye med byang chub sems ni mngon bstan na //
translated: If the unborn mind of awakening is revealed,

original: skal ldan rnal 'byor mig dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: skal ldan rnal 'byor mig dang ldan pa dag /
translated: Fortunate yogic practitioners who have eyes

original: bya ba med par rang bzhin grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bya ba med par rang bzhin grol bar 'gyur //
translated: Will be free by nature without anything to do.

original: theg pa'i yang snying bka' yi rdzogs chen 'di //
analyzed: theg pa'i yang snying bka' yi rdzogs chen 'di //
translated: This great perfection of the Buddha‚Äôs words, the heart of all vehicles,

original: man ngag snying po lung nga  bstan rnams kyis //
analyzed: man ngag snying po lung nga  bstan rnams kyis //
translated: Is the heart of intimate instructions, the transmission of my teachings.

original: rang bzhin bde bar gnas na gsal bar 'grub //
analyzed: rang bzhin bde bar gnas na gsal bar 'grub //
translated: If you rest naturally and blissfully, it will be clearly accomplished.

original: ma bcos mi 'gyur 'jug cing rtsol ba med //
analyzed: ma bcos mi 'gyur 'jug cing rtsol ba med //
translated: It is uncontrived, unchanging, engaging, and effortless.

original: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byad rgyal po ste //
analyzed: kye / nga ni ston pa kun byad rgyal po ste //
translated: Ky√©! I am the teacher, the king of all those who have appeared,

original: theg pa'i rab  chos kyi snying po'i lung //
analyzed: theg pa'i rab  chos kyi snying po'i lung //
translated: The transmission of the heart of the Dharma, the best of vehicles.

original: sku gsum ston pas ma gsungs rgya che ba //
analyzed: sku gsum ston pas ma gsungs rgya che ba //
translated: The teachers of the three kayas have not taught it, nor will they teach it.

original: skye ba med par ston pa'i sems rgyad 'di //üîΩdus gsum rgyal @123a *//
analyzed: skye ba med par ston pa'i sems rgyad 'di // dus gsum rgyal @123a *//
translated: This tantra that reveals the unborn mind

original: bas sngon chang ma gsungs te //
analyzed: bas sngon chang ma gsungs te //
translated: Has not been taught by the buddhas of the three times.

original: phyi ma mi gsung da ltar ston mi mdzad //
analyzed: phyi ma mi gsung da ltar ston mi mdzad //
translated: It will not be taught in the future, nor is it being taught at present.

original: kun byed rgyal pos 'pho 'gyur mi mnga' bas //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal pos 'pho 'gyur mi mnga' bas //
translated: Since the all-creating king does not change,

original: snga par gsungs shing phyis kyang gsung 'gyur la //
analyzed: snga par gsungs shing phyis kyang gsung 'gyur la //
translated: It was taught in the past and will be taught in the future.

original: da ltar byung bar gsungs pas skal ldan la //
analyzed: da ltar byung bar gsungs pas skal ldan la //
translated: Since it is said to be present in the present, it is the definitive teaching for the fortunate.

original: nges par bstan pas 'bad med grol ba'i lung //
analyzed: nges par bstan pas 'bad med grol ba'i lung //
translated: It is the transmission of effortless liberation.

original: mdo lung mngon du bstan pa'i bka' rgyud 'di //üîΩmi 'phel mi nub snying po 'dzin pa la //
analyzed: mdo lung mngon du bstan pa'i bka' rgyud 'di // mi 'phel mi nub snying po 'dzin pa la //
translated: This tantra of the transmission of the teachings of the sutras

original: kun byed rgyal po nges par khyod la gtad /
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po nges par khyod la gtad /
translated: is entrusted to you, O all-creating king,

original: ces gsungs so //üîΩbyang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /üîΩmtshan gyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: ces gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las / mtshan gyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
translated: so that it will not increase, will not disappear, and will be held as the heart essence.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po lta ba nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pa'i rgyud nam mkha'i snying po mchag gi don gsang ba mchog gi mdo lung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po lta ba nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pa'i rgyud nam mkha'i snying po mchag gi don gsang ba mchog gi mdo lung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
translated: This completes the eighty-fourth chapter of the Tantra of the Secret Core of the Supreme Sky, which is the view of the all-creating mind of awakening like the sky, without center or edge.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal gyi seng ge mgon po dang / dge slong bee ro ts'a nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o ////
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal gyi seng ge mgon po dang / dge slong bee ro ts'a nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o ////
translated: This was translated, requested, and finalized by the Indian abbot Shri-Simha-Ghopa and the monk Vairochana.
